1.0.name: wordpress/sales-cheater
1.0.description: You are running Internet marketing and want to sell your products? This plugin helps you to make your products more interesting. There is a text anywhere to put in your website, which indicates how many pieces you have now sold. A customer buys more naturally when other do and this is the big advantage of using the plugin. Of course, the daily sales figures have to be different that it really works well. With this plugin, you can determine how often your fictitious sales are updated and in what number of pieces. Here you choose one of the upper and lower limit.
